name: INRestaurantResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for the restaurant selected by a user.

items.name: class func success(with: INRestaurant) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INRestaurant?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

items.name: class func disambiguation(with: [INRestaurant]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
